00066 
00088 class EGS_ANGULAR_SPREAD_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_AngularSpreadSource :
00089           public EGS_BaseSource {
00090 
00091 public:
00092 
00093     EGS_AngularSpreadSource(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00094     ~EGS_AngularSpreadSource() {
00095         EGS_Object::deleteObject(source);
00096     };
00097 
00098     EGS_I64 getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00099             int &q, int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt,
00100             EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u) {
00101         EGS_I64 c = source->getNextParticle(rndm,q,latch,E,wt,x,u);
00102         //egsInformation("\nGot u=(%g,%g,%g)\n",u.x,u.y,u.z);
00103         if( sigma > 0 ) {
00104             EGS_Float cost; do { cost = 1 + sigma*log(1 - rndm->getUniform()); } while (cost <= -1);
00105             EGS_Float cphi, sphi;
00106             rndm->getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00107             EGS_Float sint = sqrt(1-cost*cost);
00108             u.rotate(cost,sint,cphi,sphi);
00109             //egsInformation("sampled cost=%g -> unew=(%g,%g,%g)\n",cost,u.x,u.y,u.z);
00110         }
00111         return c;
00112     };
00113     EGS_Float getEmax() const { return source->getEmax(); };
00114     EGS_Float getFluence() const { return source->getFluence(); };
00115     bool storeState(ostream &data) const { return source->storeState(data); };
00116     bool setState(istream &data) { return source->setState(data); };
00117     bool addState(istream &data_in) { return source->addState(data_in); };
00118     void resetCounter() { source->resetCounter(); };
00119 
00120     bool isValid() const { return (source != 0); };
00121 
00122 protected:
00123 
00124     EGS_BaseSource     *source; 
00125     EGS_Float           sigma;
00126 
00127     void setUp();
00128 
00129 };
00130 
00131 #endif
